name: Throwing Shade (Nasty Old Wizard)
description:
Hello! Thanks for playing our dinky little game, this was my first time making anything with Monogame, and our first Ludum Dare on top of that! It is very buggy but definitely playable I think, enjoy!

Programmer (Casey MacNeil)

Artist(Dalton Leavey)

Level Designer (Mike Jennings)

!!PLEASE RATE AND LEAVE A COMMENT HERE!!
